text: Hagi kotama mani'za enaza Juda kini vahe'mo'zama huhampri zmantage'za mani'ne'za, Jerusalemine Juda kumapine, tvaozanire'ma me'nea kumatamimpima havi anumzante mono'ma hunte kuma'ma tro'ma hunte'naza kumapinema, havi anumzante kresramna nevu'za, Bali havi anumzante'ene, ikante'ene zagere'ene maka monafi hanafitaminte'enema mnanentake'zama kremnama nevaza pristi vahera, Josaia'a zamazeri atre vagare'ne.
